title: Create Water
description: Creates 2 gallons/level of pure water.

title: Detect Magic
description: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.

title: Detect Poison
description: Detects poison in one creature or object.

title: Flare
description: Dazzles one creature (–1 penalty on attack rolls).

title: Guidance
description: +1 on one attack roll, saving throw, or skill check.

title: Know Direction
description: You discern north.

title: Light
description: Object shines like a torch.

title: Mending
description: Makes minor repairs on an object.

title: Purify Food and Drink
description: Purifies 1 cu. ft./level of food or water.

title: Read Magic
description: Read scrolls and spellbooks.

title: Resistance
description: Subject gains +1 bonus on saving throws.

title: Spark
description: Ignites flammable objects.

title: Stabilize
description: Cause a dying creature to stabilize.

title: Virtue
description: Subject gains 1 temporary hp.

title: Air Bubble
description: Creates a small pocket of air around your head or an object.

title: Alter Winds
description: Increase/decrease strength of natural winds.

title: Ant Haul
description: Triples carrying capacity of a creature.

title: Aspect of the Falcon
description: Gives bonuses on Perception checks and ranged attacks.

title: Bristle
description: Trade natural armor bonus for a bonus on attacks with natural weapons.

title: Burning Disarm
description: A metal object instantly becomes red hot possibly causing the wielder to drop it or take damage.

title: Calm Animals
description: Calms 2d4 + level HD of animals.

title: Charm Animal
description: Makes one animal your friend.

title: Cloak of Shade
description: Reduces effects of sun exposure and heat.

title: Cure Light Wounds
description: Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level (max +5).

title: Damp Powder
description: Ruins ammunition loaded in the targeted firearm.

title: Decompose Corpse
description: Turn a corpse into a clean skeleton.

title: Detect Aberration
description: Reveals presence of aberrations.

title: Detect Animals or Plants
description: Detects kinds of animals or plants.

title: Detect Snares and Pits
description: Reveals natural or primitive traps.

title: Detect the Faithful
description: You can detect other worshipers of your deity.

title: Diagnose Disease
description: Detect and identify diseases.

title: Dream Feast
description: Target awakens from normal rest as if ate and drank a nutritious meal.

title: Endure Elements
description: Exist comfortably in hot or cold regions.

title: Entangle
description: Plants entangle everyone in 40-ft. radius.

title: Expeditious Excavation
description: Moves 5-ft. cubes of earth.

title: Faerie Fire
description: Outlines subjects with light, canceling blur, concealment, and the like.

title: Feather Step
description: Ignore movement penalty in difficult terrain.

title: Flare Burst
description: As flare, but all creatures within 10 ft.

title: Frostbite
description: Target takes cold damage and is fatigued.

title: Goodberry
description: 2d4 berries each cure 1 hp (max 8 hp/24 hours).

title: Hide from Animals
description: Animals can't perceive one subject/level.

title: Hydraulic Push
description: Wave of water bull rushes an enemy.

title: Jump
description: Subject gets bonus on Acrobatics checks.

title: Keen Senses
description: Gain +2 Perception and low-light vision.

title: Liberating Command
description: Target makes an Escape Artist check as an immediate action and gains a bonus on it.

title: Longstrider
description: Your speed increases by 10 ft.

title: Magic Fang
description: One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1 on attack and damage rolls.

title: Magic Stone
description: Three stones gain +1 on attack rolls, deal 1d6+1 damage.

title: Negate Aroma
description: Subject cannot be tracked by scent.

title: Obscuring Mist
description: Fog surrounds you.

title: Pass without Trace
description: One subject/level leaves no tracks.

title: Produce Flame
description: 1d6 damage + 1/level, touch or thrown.

title: Ray of Sickening
description: Ray makes the subject sickened.

title: Remove Sickness
description: Suppress disease, nausea, and the sickened condition.

title: Restore Corpse
description: Skeletal corpse grows flesh.

title: Shillelagh
description: Cudgel or quarterstaff becomes +1 weapon (2d6 damage) for 1 min./level.

title: Speak with Animals
description: You can communicate with animals.

title: Stone Fist
description: Your unarmed strikes are lethal.

title: Summon Minor Ally
description: Summon 1d3 Tiny animals.

title: Summon Nature's Ally I
description: Summons creature to fight.

title: Touch of the Sea
description: Swim speed becomes 30 ft.

title: Weaken Powder
description: Targeted firearm's ammunition halves the firearm's range and imposes a –2 penalty on damage rolls.

title: Accelerate Poison
description: Hastens targeted poison's onset.

title: Animal Aspect
description: You gain some of the beneficial qualities of an animal.

title: Animal Messenger
description: Sends a Tiny animal to a specific place.

title: Animal Trance
description: Fascinates 2d6 HD of animals.

title: Ant Haul, Communal
description: As ant haul, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Aspect of the Bear
description: +2 AC and combat maneuver rolls.

title: Barkskin
description: Grants +2 (or higher) enhancement to natural armor.

title: Bear's Endurance
description: Subject gains +4 to Con for 1 min./level.

title: Bull's Strength
description: Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 min./level.

title: Burning Gaze
description: Inflict 1d6 fire damage to creature.

title: Campfire Wall
description: Creates a shelter around a campfire.

title: Cat's Grace
description: Subject gains +4 to Dex for 1 min./level.

title: Certain Grip
description: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Acrobatics and Climb checks and to CMD.

title: Chill Metal
description: Cold metal damages those who touch it.

title: Defoliate
description: You hurl a tiny ball of negative energy, destroying plant life either in a line 60 feet long or a 10-foot-radius spread.

title: Delay Poison
description: Stops poison from harming subject for 1 hour/level.

title: Eagle Eye
description: Creates a magical sensor high above you.

title: Elemental Speech
description: Enables you to speak to elementals and some creatures.

title: Endure Elements, Communal
description: As endure elements, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Feast of Ashes
description: A target starves with an insatiable hunger.

title: Fire Trap
description: Opened object deals 1d4 + 1/level damage.

title: Flame Blade
description: Touch attack deals 1d8 + 1/two levels damage.

title: Flaming Sphere
description: Rolling ball of fire deals 3d6 fire damage.

title: Fog Cloud
description: Fog obscures vision.

title: Forest Friend
description: Plants in a forested area become helpful instead of hindering you and your allies.

title: Frigid Touch
description: Target takes cold damage and is staggered.

title: Frost Fall
description: The area is covered in a chilling frost.

title: Glide
description: You take no falling damage, move 60 ft./round while falling.

title: Gust of Wind
description: Blows away or knocks down smaller creatures.

title: Heat Metal
description: Makes metal so hot it damages those who touch it.

title: Hold Animal
description: Paralyzes one animal for 1 round/level.

title: Lockjaw
description: Creature gains grab ability with natural attack.

title: Masterwork Transformation
description: Make a normal item into a masterwork one.

title: Natural Rhythm
description: +1 on damage rolls with each hit (max +5).

title: Owl's Wisdom
description: Subject gains +4 to Wis for 1 min./level.

title: Pernicious Poison
description: Target takes a -4 penalty against poison.

title: Pox Pustules
description: Subject is sickened and has –4 Dex.

title: Reduce Animal
description: Shrinks one willing animal.

title: Resist Energy
description: Ignores 10 or more points of damage per attack from specified energy type.

title: Restoration, Lesser
description: Dispels magical ability penalty or repairs 1d4 ability damage.

title: Scent Trail
description: Leave trail for allies to follow.

title: Share Language
description: Subject understands chosen language.

title: Slipstream
description: Wave boosts creature’s speed.

title: Soften Earth and Stone
description: Turns stone to clay, or dirt to sand or mud.

title: Soothing Word
description: Reduces effects of multiple conditions on target.

title: Spider Climb
description: Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings.

title: Stone Call
description: 2d6 damage to all creatures in area.

title: Summon Nature's Ally II
description: Summons creature to fight.

title: Summon Swarm
description: Summons swarm of bats, rats, or spiders.

title: Tar Ball
description: Burning tar harms target and penalizes its Dex.

title: Tree Shape
description: You look exactly like a tree for 1 hour/level.

title: Unshakable Chill
description: Target is afflicted with severe cold.

title: Warp Wood
description: Bends wood.

title: Wartrain Mount
description: Animal gains the combat training general purpose.

title: Web Shelter
description: Create a comfortable shelter made of webbing.

title: Wilderness Soldiers
description: Nearby plants aid you in combat.

title: Wood Shape
description: Reshapes wooden objects to suit you.

title: Animal Aspect, Greater
description: As animal aspect, but you gain two animal qualities.

title: Anthropomorphic Animal
description: Animal becomes bipedal.

title: Ape Walk
description: Target gains climb 30 and +8 racial bonus on Climb skill checks.

title: Aqueous Orb
description: Creates rolling sphere of water.

title: Ash Storm
description: Hamper vision and movement.

title: Badger's Ferocity
description: Weapons are keen while you concentrate.

title: Burrow
description: Target gains a burrow speed of 15.

title: Burst of Nettles
description: Burst deals 3d6 damage and 1d6 acid.

title: Call Lightning
description: Calls down lightning bolts (3d6 per bolt) from sky.

title: Channel the Gift
description: Channel magical power into target to fuel their spellcasting. The next 3rd level or lower spell target casts does not expend a spell slot; instead you use your spell slot to power their spell.

title: Cloak of Winds
description: Creates screen of strong wind around you.

title: Companion Mind Link
description: You can talk with your animal companion, and can handle it with supernatural ease.

title: Contagion
description: Infects subject with chosen disease.

title: Create Treasure Map
description: Creates treasure map out of a creature’s corpse.

title: Cup of Dust
description: Causes a creature to become dehydrated.

title: Cure Moderate Wounds
description: Cures 2d8 damage + 1/level (max +10).

title: Daylight
description: 60-ft. radius of bright light.

title: Delay Poison, Communal
description: As delay poison, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Diminish Plants
description: Reduces size or blights the growth of normal plants.

title: Dominate Animal
description: One animal obeys your silent mental commands and orders.

title: Feather Step, Mass
description: As feather step, but multiple creatures.

title: Fungal Infestation
description: Target takes bleed from attacks.

title: Heatstroke
description: As ray of exhaustion plus 1d4 nonlethal damage and characters wearing heavy clothing or armor of any sort take a –4 penalty on their saves.

title: Hide Campsite
description: Hides all traces of your campsite.

title: Hurricane Blast
description: Creates a severe blast of wind.

title: Hydraulic Torrent
description: Creates torrent of water that bull rushes any creature in its path.

title: Lily Pad Stride
description: Walk across water on moving lily pads.

title: Mad Monkeys
description: Summon a swarm of mischievous monkeys.

title: Magic Fang, Greater
description: One natural weapon gets + 1/four levels (max +5).

title: Meld into Stone
description: You and your gear merge with stone.

title: Nature's Exile
description: Gives subject –10 on Survival checks.

title: Neutralize Poison
description: Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

title: Plant Growth
description: Grows vegetation, improves crops.

title: Poison
description: Touch deals 1d3 Con damage 1/round for 6 rounds.

title: Protection from Energy
description: Absorbs 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy.

title: Pup Shape
description: Transforms a single animal or magical beast into a younger and cuter version of itself for a short time.

title: Quench
description: Extinguishes fires.

title: Rain of Frogs
description: Summon a swarm of poisonous frogs.

title: Remove Disease
description: Cures all diseases affecting subject.

title: Resinous Skin
description: You gain DR 5/piercing and +4 to CMD against disarm attempts.

title: Resist Energy, Communal
description: As resist energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Share Language, Communal
description: As share language, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Shifting Sand
description: Creates difficult terrain and erases tracks; can carry creatures or objects along.

title: Sleet Storm
description: Hampers vision and movement.

title: Snare
description: Creates a magic booby trap.

title: Speak with Plants
description: You can talk to plants and plant creatures.

title: Spider Climb, Communal
description: As spider climb, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Spike Growth
description: Creatures in area take 1d4 damage, may be slowed.

title: Spit Venom
description: Spit blinding black adder venom.

title: Stone Shape
description: Sculpts stone into any shape.

title: Summon Nature's Ally III
description: Summons creature to fight.

title: Vermin Shape I
description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium vermin.

title: Water Breathing
description: Subjects can breathe underwater.

title: Waters of Maddening
description: Create a more potent unholy water.

title: Wind Wall
description: Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.

title: Absorb Toxicity
description: You become immune to diseases and toxins, absorb one, and then spread it to others.

title: Age Resistance, Lesser
description: Ignore penalties from middle age.

title: Air Walk
description: Subject treads on air as if solid (climb or descend at 45-degree angle).

title: Antiplant Shell
description: Keeps animated plants at bay.

title: Arboreal Hammer
description: Tree branches attack opponents.

title: Aspect of the Stag
description: +2 AC against attacks of opportunity and increases speed.

title: Atavism
description: Animal gains advanced creature simple template.

title: Ball Lightning
description: Flying lightning spheres deal 3d6 electricity damage each.

title: Blight
description: Withers one plant or deals 1d6/level damage to plant creature.

title: Bloody Claws
description: Causes bleed damage with natural attacks.

title: Cape of Wasps
description: Wasp swarm defends or carries you.

title: Command Plants
description: Sways the actions of plant creatures.

title: Control Water
description: Raises or lowers bodies of water.

title: Cure Serious Wounds
description: Cures 3d8 damage + 1/level (max +15).

title: Dispel Magic
description: Cancels one magical spell or effect.

title: Echolocation
description: Sonic sense gives you blindsight 40 ft.

title: Flame Strike
description: Smites foes with divine fire (1d6/level damage).

title: Freedom of Movement
description: Subject moves normally despite impediments to movement.

title: Geyser
description: Creates a geyser of boiling water.

title: Giant Vermin
description: Turns centipedes, scorpions, or spiders into giant vermin.

title: Grove of Respite
description: Creates trees and a small spring.

title: Ice Storm
description: Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.

title: Life Bubble
description: Protects from environmental effects.

title: Moonstruck
description: Subject is enraged and confused.

title: Obsidian Flow
description: Converts the surface of the ground into molten glass.

title: Plague Carrier
description: target's attacks carry filth fever.

title: Protection from Energy, Communal
description: As protection from energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Reincarnate
description: Brings dead subject back in a random body.

title: Repel Vermin
description: Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10 ft. away.

title: Ride the Waves
description: Target can breathe water and swim.

title: River of Wind
description: Creates wind that causes nonlethal damage and can knock down or push creatures.

title: Rusting Grasp
description: Your touch corrodes iron and alloys.

title: Scrying
description: Spies on subject from a distance.

title: Spike Stones
description: Creatures in area take 1d8 damage, may also be slowed.

title: Strong Jaw
description: Natural attacks damage as two sizes bigger.

title: Summon Nature's Ally IV
description: Summons creature to fight.

title: Thorn Body
description: Your attackers take 1d6 +1 damage/level.

title: Touch of Slime
description: Touch infests a target with green slime.

title: True Form
description: Removes polymorph effects.

title: Vermin Shape II
description: As vermin shape, but Tiny or Large.

title: Volcanic Storm
description: Hot rocks deal 5d6 damage.

title: Air Walk, Communal
description: As air walk, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Animal Growth
description: One animal doubles in size.

title: Aspect of the Wolf
description: +4 Str and Dex, +2 bonus on trip attacks.

title: Atonement
description: Removes burden of misdeeds from subject.

title: Awaken
description: Animal or tree gains human intellect.

title: Baleful Polymorph
description: Transforms subject into harmless animal.

title: Blessing of the Salamander
description: Subject gets fast healing 2, fire resistance 10, and +2 to its CMD.

title: Call Lightning Storm
description: As call lightning, but 5d6 damage per bolt.

title: Commune with Nature
description: Learn about terrain for 1 mile/level.

title: Contagion, Greater
description: Infect a subject with a magical disease.

title: Control Winds
description: Changes wind direction and speed.

title: Cure Critical Wounds
description: Cures 4d8 damage + 1/level (max +20).

title: Death Ward
description: Grants bonuses against death spells and negative energy.

title: Fickle Winds
description: Wind walls selectively block attacks.

title: Fire Snake
description: Creates a serpentine path of fire 5 ft. long/level that deals 1d6 fire damage/level.

title: Hallow
description: Designates location as holy.

title: Insect Plague
description: Wasp swarms attack creatures.

title: Raise Animal Companion
description: As raise dead, but on an animal.

title: Reprobation
description: Marked target is shunned by your religion.

title: Rest Eternal
description: Dead creature cannot be revived.

title: Snake Staff
description: Transforms wood into snakes to fight for you.

title: Stoneskin
description: Grants DR 10/adamantine.

title: Summon Nature's Ally V
description: Summons creature to fight.

title: Threefold Aspect
description: Appear older or younger.

title: Transmute Mud to Rock
description: Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

title: Transmute Rock to Mud
description: Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

title: Tree Stride
description: Step from one tree to another far away.

title: Unhallow
description: Designates location as unholy.

title: Wall of Fire
description: Deals 2d4 fire damage out to 10 ft. and 1d4 out to 20 ft. Passing through wall deals 2d6 damage +1/level.

title: Wall of Thorns
description: Thorns damage anyone who tries to pass.

title: Age Resistance
description: Ignore penalties from old age.

title: Antilife Shell
description: 10-ft.-radius field hedges out living creatures.

title: Bear's Endurance, Mass
description: As bear's endurance, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Bull's Strength, Mass
description: As bull's strength, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Cat's Grace, Mass
description: As cat's grace, affects one subject/level.

title: Cure Light Wounds, Mass
description: Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Dispel Magic, Greater
description: As dispel magic, but with multiple targets.

title: Dust Form
description: You become an incorporeal creature of dust for a short period of time.

title: Eagle Aerie
description: Summon 1 giant eagle/3 levels.

title: Epidemic
description: Infect a subject with a highly contagious disease.

title: Find the Path
description: Shows most direct way to a location.

title: Fire Seeds
description: Acorns and berries become grenades and bombs.

title: Ironwood
description: Magic wood is as strong as steel.

title: Liveoak
description: Oak becomes treant guardian.

title: Move Earth
description: Digs trenches and builds hills.

title: Owl's Wisdom, Mass
description: As owl's wisdom, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Plague Storm
description: Cloud infects creatures like contagion.

title: Repel Wood
description: Pushes away wooden objects.

title: Sirocco
description: Hot wind does 4d6 damage, fatigues those damaged, and knocks creatures prone.

title: Spellstaff
description: Stores one spell in wooden quarterstaff.

title: Stoneskin, Communal
description: As stoneskin, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Stone Tell
description: Talk to natural or worked stone.

title: Summon Nature's Ally VI
description: Summons creature to fight.

title: Swarm Skin
description: Turns your body into a swarm that can attack.

title: Tar Pool
description: Converts the top layer of the ground into hot tar.

title: Transport via Plants
description: Move instantly from one plant to another of the same kind.

title: Wall of Stone
description: Creates a stone wall that can be shaped.

title: Age Resistance, Greater
description: Ignore penalties from venerable age.

title: Animate Plants
description: One or more plants animate and fight for you.

title: Changestaff
description: Your staff becomes a treant on command.

title: Control Weather
description: Changes weather in local area.

title: Creeping Doom
description: Swarms of centipedes attack at your command.

title: Cure Moderate Wounds, Mass
description: Cures 2d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Fire Storm
description: Deals 1d6/level fire damage.

title: Heal
description: Cures 10 points/level damage, all diseases and mental conditions.

title: Rampart
description: Creates 5-ft.-thick earthen barrier.

title: Scouring Winds
description: Winds block vision and deal 3d6 damage.

title: Scrying, Greater
description: As scrying, but faster and longer.

title: Siege of Trees
description: Transforms Large trees into arboreal catapults of the same size.

title: Summon Nature's Ally VII
description: Summons creature to fight.

title: Sunbeam
description: Beam blinds and deals 4d6 damage.

title: Transmute Metal to Wood
description: Metal within 40 ft. becomes wood.

title: True Seeing
description: Lets you see all things as they really are.

title: Vortex
description: Creates a whirlpool in water.

title: Wind Walk
description: You and your allies turn vaporous and travel fast.

title: Animal Shapes
description: One ally/level polymorphs into chosen animal.

title: Atavism, Mass
description: One animal/level gains advanced template.

title: Blood Mist
description: Mist causes Wisdom damage and rage.

title: Control Plants
description: Controls actions of one or more plant creatures.

title: Cure Serious Wounds, Mass
description: Cures 3d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

title: Earthquake
description: Intense tremor shakes 80-ft.-radius.

title: Euphoric Tranquility
description: Makes a creature friendly.

title: Finger of Death
description: Deals 10 damage/level to one subject.

title: Frightful Aspect
description: You take on a terrifying, Large-sized form of yourself and emit an aura that causes creatures to become shaken orfrightened.

title: Repel Metal or Stone
description: Pushes away metal and stone.

title: Reverse Gravity
description: Objects and creatures fall upward.

title: Seamantle
description: Sheathes you in protective water.

title: Stormbolts
description: 1d8 damage/level (max 20d8) to targets.

title: Summon Nature's Ally VIII
description: Summons creature to fight.

title: Sunburst
description: Blinds all within 10 ft., deals 6d6 damage.

title: Wall of Lava
description: Wall damages foes that try to enter, periodically launches lava at nearby targets.

title: Whirlwind
description: Cyclone deals damage and can pick up creatures.

title: Word of Recall
description: Teleports you back to designated place.

title: Antipathy
description: Object or location affected by spell repels certain creatures.

title: Clashing Rocks
description: 20d6 damage to target creature.

title: Cure Critical Wounds, Mass
description: Cures 4d8 damage + 1/level for many creatures.

title: Elemental Swarm
description: Summons multiple elementals.

title: Foresight
description: “Sixth sense” warns of impending danger.

title: Polar Midnight
description: Cold darkness paralyzes and deals damage.

title: Regenerate
description: Subject's severed limbs grow back, cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +35).

title: Shambler
description: Creates 1d4+2 shambling mounds to fight for you.

title: Shapechange
description: Transforms you into certain creatures, and you can change forms once per round.

title: Siege of Trees, Greater
description: As siege of trees, but can transform Huge and Gargantuan trees into arboreal catapults of the same size.

title: Storm of Vengeance
description: Storm rains acid, lightning, and hail.

title: Summon Elder Worm
description: Summon a giant purple worm.

title: Summon Froghemoth
description: Summon a froghemoth.

title: Summon Nature's Ally IX
description: Summons creature to fight.

title: Sympathy
description: Object or location attracts certain creatures.

title: Tsunami
description: Huge wave damages and sweeps up all in its path.

title: Winds of Vengeance
description: You can fly and attack with wind.

title: World Wave
description: Earth or water moves you across distances and damages things not of the natural world.
